GS41yogay1_u:37: BY_1.1ab/.yasminn udayati vikasati kamalam ivāstaṃ prayāti saṃkucati/

GS41yogay1_u:40: BY_1.2cd/.vinighnato vighnakarān na pāpaṃ kriyāt krameṇaiva paśūn makheṣu//

GS41yogay1_u:44: BY_1.4cd/.dakṣaḥ pragalbho 'vikalo vinītas tādṛg vidhastasya purohito 'pi//

GS41yogay1_u:49: BY_1.7ab/.utthānāc ced bhavet siddhir na kaścit prāpnuyāt phalam/

GS41yogay1_u:56: BY_1.10cd/.teṣāṃ cirād api kṛtāntamahāpaśūnāṃ hastagrahaṃ na samupaiti jitāpi lakṣmī//

GS41yogay1_u:69: BY_1.16ab/.na vinā mānuṣaṃ daivaṃ daivaṃ vā mānuṣaṃ vinā/

GS41yogay1_u:75: BY_1.19ab/.yatnena sampadya manuṣyakāraṃ yatnāvakāśe puruṣo niruddhaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:76: BY_1.19cd/.pratīkṣate daivamataṃ dvitīyas tam āpado nātmakṛtāḥ spṛśanti//
GS41yogay1_u:78: BY_1.20cd/.kṛcchreṇa śeṣaṃ mahatā yato 'to bhājyāni mṛgyāṇi nṛbhir nṛkāraiḥ//E20
GS41yogay1_u:80: BY_2.1a/.yātrākālam ataḥ paraṃ munimatāny ālokya saṃkhyāpayā-
GS41yogay1_u:81: BY_2.1b/.(mya)bhyuddhuṣya pṛthūktam akṣaragurau sampannnam īśaṃ bhuvaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:82: BY_2.1c/.jñāte janmani tasya yānasamayaṃ vāṃchanti horāvidas
GS41yogay1_u:83: BY_2.1d/.tv ajñāte 'py aphaleṣu nākṣaram iva prāhātra ratnāvalim//
GS41yogay1_u:85: BY_2.2cd/.āyuṣi ca parijñāte śubham aśubhaṃ vā phalaṃ vācyam//
GS41yogay1_u:90: BY_2.4ab/.apṛcchataḥ pṛcchato vā yiyāsor yasya kasya cit/
GS41yogay1_u:94: BY_2.6ab/.aśrauṣīc ca purā viṣṇor jñānārthaṃ samupasthitaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:96: BY_2.7ab/.yat sāraṃ pṛcchataḥ puṃso graharā(śyā)śritaṃ phalam/
GS41yogay1_u:97: BY_2.7cd/.tatsāraṃ tasya janma syād ya(dya)py anyagṛhe bhavet//
GS41yogay1_u:106: BY_2.10c/.sad iti sadasi vācyaṃ yady api syād asat tat
GS41yogay1_u:107: BY_2.10d/.sphuṭam pai kathanīyaṃ bhūbhuje mantriṇe vā//
GS41yogay1_u:116: BY_2.13a/.udayam udayapaṃ vā janmabhaṃ janmapaṃ vā
GS41yogay1_u:117: BY_2.13b/.tad upacayagṛhaṃ vā vīkṣya lagne yiyāsoḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:118: BY_2.13c/.vinihatam aripakṣaṃ viddhi śatror idaṃ vā
GS41yogay1_u:120: BY_2.14ab/.pārṣṇigrāhaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhāskarasya prāg yātavyastigmaraśmeś ca yānaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:121: BY_2.14cd/.ākrandārkāt saptame yaḥ sthitaś ca tattulyāste śaktitaś cintayīyāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:123: BY_2.15b/.siddhārtho 'rigaṇān vijitya na cirāt praṣṭā sametyālayam/
GS41yogay1_u:124: BY_2.15c/.lagne vā kujamandayoḥ sutagate jīve ravau karmage
GS41yogay1_u:125: BY_2.15d/.lābhe karmaṇi vā sitendusutayoḥ praṣṭur jayo niścitaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:126: BY_2.16ab/.tasminn eva bhaved yoge yadi śukro 'ṣṭam āśritaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:127: BY_2.16cd/.praṣṭāram udyamād eva hataśaktir viśasty ariḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:131: BY_2.18cd/.caturthe jñe 'ṣṭame candre jāyāsthe ca site jayaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:133: BY_2.19cd/.candre ṣaṣṭhe vilagnasthaiḥ śeṣaiḥ praṣṭurdhruvo jayaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:135: BY_2.20cd/.gurau vā lagnage pāpair lābhe karmaṇi vā sthitaiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:138: BY_2.22ab/.ity yogāḥ śubhāḥ proktāḥ praśnakāle jayāśritāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:139: BY_2.22cd/.aśubhās tu bhavanty atra tān pravakṣyāmy ataḥ param//
GS41yogay1_u:142: BY_2.24ab/.savakre nidhane mande mṛtyur lagne divākare/
GS41yogay1_u:143: BY_2.24cd/.candre 'smin tryāyamṛtyusthe sasūrye vā vaded vadham//
GS41yogay1_u:155: BY_2.30cd/.tadvan mandārayor yuddhe bhaṅgaḥ saumyārkayos tathā//
GS41yogay1_u:156: BY_2.31ab/.sarvais tu navame rājā hanti mantripurohitān/
GS41yogay1_u:159: BY_2.32cd/.candre 'ste vibalaiḥ saumyaiḥ praṣṭuḥ senāpater vadhaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:161: BY_2.33cd/.jñe tṛtīye ca vikramya samantrī hanyate nṛpaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:171: BY_3.1ab/.nandā bhadrā vijayāś cātha riktāḥ pūrṇāś caitāḥ phalam evaṃ vidadhyuḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:172: BY_3.1cd/.neṣṭā madhyā pravarāś ceti śukle kṛṇṇe cintyās tithayas tāḥ pratīpāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:173: BY_3.2ab/.sarvāḥ śastās tithayaḥ śuklapakṣe hitvā tryṃśaṃ bahule 'ntyaṃ ca kaiścit/
GS41yogay1_u:174: BY_3.2cd/.ṣaṣṭhyaṣṭamyor vasulabdhāpi yātā dvādaśyāṃ vā nāśam āśu prayāti//
GS41yogay1_u:175: BY_3.3ab/.pratipadi phalam eke pañcadaśyāṃ ca neṣṭaṃ jagur idam iti tajjñair yāpyam evāvadhāryam/
GS41yogay1_u:176: BY_3.3cd/.kim api kim api nūnaṃ taiḥ samīkṣyoktam etat samavacanavighāte yuktatā kena cintyā//E3
GS41yogay1_u:180: BY_4.1c/.surapatir api kṛcchraṃ yāti taṃ laṃghayitvā
GS41yogay1_u:182: BY_4.2ab/.prāgdvārikair analadiṅ na virodham eti śeṣāḥ pradakṣiṇagatāḥ vidiśaḥ prakalpyāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:183: BY_4.2cd/.ullaṃghya daṇḍam api kāmam iyān narendraḥ śūlaṃ vihāya yadi diṅmukhalagnaśuddhiḥ//

GS41yogay1_u:187: BY_4.3d/.saumyām aryamadaivate ca gatavān mṛtyor vaśaṃ śambaraḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:188: BY_4.4ab/.puṣyo 'tha hastaḥ śravaṇaḥ śraviṣṭhā prācyādimukhyāny udag aśviyuk ca/
GS41yogay1_u:189: BY_4.4cd/.naiśākaraṃ tvāṣṭram athānurādhā pauṣṇaṃ ca madhyāni tathāhur eke//
GS41yogay1_u:194: BY_4.6a/.sve sve karmaṇi pūjitāni munibhiḥ śuddhāni sarvāṇy api
GS41yogay1_u:196: BY_4.6c/.rohiṇyāṃ triṣu cottareṣu vijayo yātur viśākhāsu ca
GS41yogay1_u:200: BY_4.7c/.rātryādau tu na pauṣṇamaitraśaśibhatvāṣṭreṣu vāṃchan dyutiṃ
GS41yogay1_u:201: BY_4.7d/.rātrer madhyam apāsya pūrvabharaṇīpitryeṣu hantuṃ parāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:202: BY_4.8ab/.niśāntabhāge triṣu vaiṣṇavādyeṣv iyād dhanārthī na punarvasau ca/
GS41yogay1_u:205: BY_4.9cd/.kṛtvā prayāṇaṃ śravaṇe śriyo 'rthī viśen na jātuḥ kṣitipaḥ svasīmni//

GS41yogay1_u:247: BY_4.30b/.niśi ca bhagane śastaṃ yānaṃ tithau guṇavarjite/

GS41yogay1_u:276: BY_7.1cd/.tatra dehanavate 'vajāyate tena karmasu na sādhakaḥ smṛtaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:277: BY_7.2ab/.tac ca tasya bahubhir viśodhitaṃ lagnam eva sutarāṃ yatas tanuḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:278: BY_7.2cd/.tulyadehanavatāṃ prapadya kiṃ sodayodayam uvāca śobhanam//
GS41yogay1_u:280: BY_7.3cd/.janmago 'pi hi tadā praśasyate yo 'ṣṭavargaśubhadaḥ sa śobhanaḥ//

GS41yogay1_u:289: BY_7.8ab/.upacayagṛhayuktaḥ savyagaḥ śuklapakṣe śubham abhilaṣamāṇaḥ saumyamadhyasthito vā/

GS41yogay1_u:297: BY_8.1cd/.mṛgapativaśe tiṣṭhanty ete vihāya sarīsṛpān na kathitagṛheṣūhyaṃ vaśyaṃ janavyavahārataḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:298: BY_8.2ab/.sthalajalajasarīsṛpāḥ svakānāṃ balam abhivīkṣya vidheyatāṃ bhajante/
GS41yogay1_u:299: BY_8.2cd/.viṣamagṛhavaśe samā dyusaṃsthā niśi viṣamā vaśavartinaḥ samānām//
GS41yogay1_u:300: BY_8.3ab/.śīrṣodaye samabhivāṃchitakāryasiddhiḥ pṛṣṭhodaye viphalatāṃ balavidravaś ca/

GS41yogay1_u:302: BY_8.4ab/.śastaṃ divā dinabale niśi naktavīrye rāśau viparyayabale gamanaṃ na śastam/
GS41yogay1_u:304: BY_8.5ab/.mīnodaye pravasataḥ kuṭilaḥ sadoṣo mārge bhavaty akṛtakāryanivartanam ca/
GS41yogay1_u:305: BY_8.5cd/.anyāṃśakeṣv api jhaṣe phalam etad eva mīnāṃśakeṣu ca pararkṣasamāśriteṣu//

GS41yogay1_u:308: BY_8.7ab/.śatroḥ prasūtisamaye yadi nidhanaṃ saṃyutaṃ grahaiḥ pāpaiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:309: BY_8.7cd/.saumyayutaṃ vā ṣaṣṭhaṃ sadasatphalatā tatas tābhyām//
GS41yogay1_u:310: BY_8.8ab/.kleśād vinā phalam arikṣayam arthasiddhiṃ prāpnoti lagnasahite pravasan svalagne/
GS41yogay1_u:311: BY_8.8cd/.arthakṣayaṃ śramamanarthamato dvitīye kalyāṇasaukhyavibhavāgamam āhur eke//
GS41yogay1_u:314: BY_8.10ab/.dyūne 'dhvavāhanavipatkṣudatiśramārtir bandho vadhaḥ paribhavo nidhane rujaś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:315: BY_8.10cd/.dharme 'rthanāśagadakāryavipadbhayāni kāryaṃ vinā balabhayaṃ daśame kṣayaś ca//
GS41yogay1_u:316: BY_8.11ab/.kecid vadanty upacayopagṛhītam etat tasmāc chubhaṃ daśamabhe gamanaṃ vilagen/
GS41yogay1_u:317: BY_8.11cd/.arthāptidīptiśubhasiddhijayāś ca lābhe ripphe chalaṃ vyaaybhaye vijite 'pi bhedaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:319: BY_8.12b/.dyūne kleśam avāpya janmabhavanāt prāpnoti paścāt sukham/
GS41yogay1_u:321: BY_8.12d/.śeṣarkṣeṣu yathaiva lagnabhavanāt tadvat phalaṃ janmataḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:323: BY_8.13cd/.śastā cāndre devatārthaṃ svadeśe kauje pittavyālaśastrāgnipīḍā//
GS41yogay1_u:324: BY_8.14ab/.baudhe tuṣṭir vāṃchitāptir yaśaś ca jaive 'thāptiḥ sthānamānārināśāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:325: BY_8.14cd/.strīratnāptiḥ kāryasiddhiś ca śaukre mānde bandhavyādhinīcāvamānāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:326: BY_8.15ab/.saumyo 'pi janmani na yaḥ śubhapuṣṭidātā sthānaṃ na tasya śubhadaṃ vrajato vilagen/
GS41yogay1_u:327: BY_8.15cd/.pāpo 'pi yaḥ śubhaphalaṃ prakaroti puṃsāṃ sthānaṃ vilagnagatam iṣṭam uśanti tasya//
GS41yogay1_u:332: BY_8.18ab/.kecid vadanti yasmin graho niraṃśaṃ karoti tallagnam/
GS41yogay1_u:334: BY_8.19ab/.vṛṣavṛścikakarkaṭair nṛṇām anukūlair api lagnam āśritaiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:336: BY_8.20ab/.veśirvilagnopagato yiyāsor vināpi yatnāt kurute phalāptim/
GS41yogay1_u:337: BY_8.20cd/.gauyānam iṣṭaṃ jalarāśilagne tad aṃśake cānyagṛhodaye 'pi//E20
GS41yogay1_u:339: BY_9.1ab/.ūrdhvā tiryag vānatā syāc ca horā muktā krāntā nāgatārkā krameṇa/
GS41yogay1_u:340: BY_9.1cd/.ity etāḥ syur jīvaśarmopadeśe jñeyo rāśir brahmaṣaṇḍasya pakṣe//
GS41yogay1_u:341: BY_9.2ab/.ūrdhvā syād yā ṣaṭcarādyeṣu horā bhūyo bhūyo maṇḍale kaiścid uktā/
GS41yogay1_u:342: BY_9.2cd/.rāśau rāśau prāgvilagnopayātaiḥ drekkāṇais tu prāha horāṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:343: BY_9.3ab/.sarvaṃ pramāṇaṃ municoditatvāt kiṃ tv atra yojyaṃ dalam eva horā/
GS41yogay1_u:344: BY_9.3cd/.yasmin sahasrāṃśuravasthito 'rdhe tiryaṅmukhī sā gaṇaye tato 'nyāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:345: BY_9.4a/.dhatte vāṃchitakāryam ūrdhvavadanā kleśād vinā lagnagā
GS41yogay1_u:347: BY_9.4c/.sainyabhraṃśam adhomukhī prakurute kṛcchrād gṛhe cāgamaṃ
GS41yogay1_u:348: BY_9.4d/.srvāḥ puṣṭaphalapradāḥ svapatinā dṛṣṭā na pāpagrahaiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:349: BY_9.5ab/.grahadivasaphalaṃ yad eva yātur tad akhilam eva karoti tasya horā/
GS41yogay1_u:353: BY_9.6c/.saumyair dṛṣṭe jayaḥ syāt praharaṇasahite pāpadṛṣṭe ca bhaṅgaḥ
GS41yogay1_u:354: BY_9.6d/.sāgnau dāho 'tha bandhaḥ sabhujaganigale pāśayukte ca yātuḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:355: BY_9.7ab/.nṛpabhūrtir lagnagate drekkāṇe mantriṇo dvitīye ca/
GS41yogay1_u:361: BY_9.10ab/.jñeyaṃ balaṃ prayātur mantrasya viniścayaś ca tatparatah/
GS41yogay1_u:366: BY_9.12cd/.sainyārogyaṃ sainyaṃ catuṣpadaṃ ca kramāt tritaye//
GS41yogay1_u:367: BY_9.13ab/.kāryaṃ kośaḥ phalasiddhayas traye bhūmipās traye parataḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:369: BY_9.14ab/.ity udayādyā bhāvā drekkāṇair ye mayā samuddiṣṭāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:375: BY_9.17ab/.yad udayati phalaṃ grahe pradiṣṭaṃ janayati tasya navāṃśako vlagne/
GS41yogay1_u:376: BY_9.17cd/.subhabhavananavāṃśe sahāyo ripubalabhāgam upaiti yātur atra//
GS41yogay1_u:377: BY_9.18ab/.yat proktaṃ rāśy udaye dvādaśabhāge 'pi tat phalaṃ vācyam/
GS41yogay1_u:378: BY_9.18cd/.yac ca navāṃśakavihitaṃ triṃśāṃśasyodaye tat syāt//E18
GS41yogay1_u:382: BY_10.2ab/.putrāpadaṃ sutagṛhe 'dhvani cārthasiddhiṃ ṣaṣṭhe 'bhivāṃchitaphalāptim arikṣayaṃ ca/
GS41yogay1_u:383: BY_10.2cd/.dyūne kalatrakalahaṃ dhanasaṃkṣayaṃ ca mṛtyuṃ karoti nidhane savitā rujaṃ ca//
GS41yogay1_u:384: BY_10.3ab/.dharmaṃ hinasti navame savitārthadaś ca hatvā viyatyaviditaṃ śramakarmadātā/
GS41yogay1_u:385: BY_10.3cd/.ratnāgamaṃ subahu lābhagataḥ karoti kṛtvā vyayaṃ vyayagataḥ kurute 'rtham alpam//
GS41yogay1_u:386: BY_10.4ab/.lagne śaśī kalahaśokakaro na pūrṇaḥ strīvājiratnasuhṛdātmajadaḥ kuṭumbe/
GS41yogay1_u:387: BY_10.4cd/.duścikyago yuvatiratnadhanapradātā bandhvāptidaḥ suhṛdi tatkṣayadaś ca kṛṣṇe//
GS41yogay1_u:388: BY_10.5ab/.arthapradas tanayagaḥ sutaśokakṛc ca mitrāritāṃ prakurute na sukhaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhe/
GS41yogay1_u:390: BY_10.6ab/.pratyeti cāśu navame kurute ca kāryaṃ kṣīṇe kṣayo viyati vṛddhirato 'nyathāsthe/
GS41yogay1_u:391: BY_10.6cd/.aiśvaryasaukhyadhanalābham upaite lābhe kleśakṣayavyayabhayāni ca riṣphayāte//
GS41yogay1_u:392: BY_10.7ab/.lagne viṣāgnirudhirāgamaśastrabādhā bhindyād balaṃ dhanagato 'rthakaraś ca paścāt/
GS41yogay1_u:394: BY_10.8ab/.putāpadaṃ kṣitisutaḥ kurute sutasthaḥ śatrupraṇāśam acirād arigaḥ karoti/
GS41yogay1_u:396: BY_10.9ab/.dharmaṃ na sādhayati dharmagato mahījaḥ śasto 'mbare na śubhadaḥ kathito 'pariś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:397: BY_10.9cd/.lābhe 'rthasiddhivibhavāgamadaḥ prayātur vittakṣayaṃ bahu karoti gataś ca riṣphe//
GS41yogay1_u:399: BY_10.10b/.sotkaṇṭhaṃ sa virāgameti sahaje kāmān labhetākhilān/
GS41yogay1_u:401: BY_10.10d/.ṣaṣṭhe yāty aribādhyatāṃ śaśisute kleśaś ca yātur bhavet//
GS41yogay1_u:403: BY_10.11b/.kecit kleśam uśanti naidhanagate śaṃsanti kecic chubham/
GS41yogay1_u:404: BY_10.11c/.dharme dharmavivṛddhir ambaragate siddhir bhaved īpsitā
GS41yogay1_u:405: BY_10.11d/.vidyārthāptir ayatnataś ca parato riṣphe ca vācyo vyayaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:406: BY_10.12ab/.kīrtir lagne 'rthāthasiddhir dvitīye duścikyasthe kṣucchramārtiḥ surejye/
GS41yogay1_u:407: BY_10.12cd/.pātālasthe dharmatatvābhimānā kāryaṃ sidhyaty ātmajasthe 'py asādhyam//
GS41yogay1_u:408: BY_10.13ab/.ṣaṣṭhe jīve śatrurāyāti vaśyaṃ kecit prāhur vaśyatāṃ yāti śatroḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:409: BY_10.13cd/.vindanty aste 'riṣṭayoṣāyaśāṃsi mṛtyau prāṇān hanty athānye jagur na//
GS41yogay1_u:410: BY_10.14ab/.putrotpattir dharmasiddhiś ca dharme jīve karmaṇy arthasiddhir yaśaś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:411: BY_10.14cd/.lābhe kāryaṃ vāñchitaṃ yāti siddhiḥ riṣphe prāpte kliśyate 'nekaduḥkhaiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:413: BY_10.15b/.lābho 'rthe sahaje na sīdati gataḥ prāpnoti śreṣṭhāṃ śrutim/
GS41yogay1_u:419: BY_10.16d/.vyarthaṃ dvādaśago vyayaṃ prakurute śasto 'parair dvādaśe//
GS41yogay1_u:420: BY_10.17ab/.bandhaṃ vadhaṃ cārkasute vilagne dhane arthahāniṃ labhate śubhaṃ ca/
GS41yogay1_u:421: BY_10.17cd/.śatror balaṃ hanti gatas tṛtīye caturthago bandhubhayaṃ parebhyaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:422: BY_10.18ab/.nārthasya siddhiḥ sutage 'rkaputre ripūn ripusthe sṛjayaty ayatnāt/
GS41yogay1_u:424: BY_10.19ab/.dharme na dharmaṃ labhate sukhañ ca yānāvṛtiṃ karmaphalaṃ ca svasthe/
GS41yogay1_u:425: BY_10.19cd/.ekādaśasthe jayavittalābhān mande 'ntyage nārtham upaiti yātā//
GS41yogay1_u:434: BY_10.22ab/.ekīyapakṣe 'pi hi kaiścid ukto bhṛguḥ śubho 'ntyātmajalābhavarjam/
GS41yogay1_u:437: BY_11.1ab/.saumyāsaumyeṣv etal lagnādstheṣu yat phalaṃ proktam/
GS41yogay1_u:439: BY_11.2ab/.horāvido jagur idaṃ sutāv abalo daśādhipāriś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:441: BY_11.3ab/.sāmprataṃ śubhadaḥ sutau balanvito yo daśādhi(pa)mitraṃ ca/
GS41yogay1_u:448: BY_11.5cd/.pāpāṃ copacayasthaṃ na vilagne tatra ca ślokau//
GS41yogay1_u:453: BY_11.8ab/.tac ca viruddhaṃ teṣāṃ katham anyadaśāsu dāsyate svaphalam/
GS41yogay1_u:454: BY_11.8cd/.evaṃ phalasya nāśo vrajati sarvasya phalali(lī)psoḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:455: BY_11.9ab/.tasmān naikānto 'yaṃ jātakam avalokya nirdiśet sadasat/
GS41yogay1_u:456: BY_11.9cd/.ślokau vṛttaṃ bhedaṃ prāha maṇittho vasiṣṭhaś ca//
GS41yogay1_u:457: BY_11.10ab/.rakṣakā vardhakāś caiva ye syur janmani nāyakāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:458: BY_11.10cd/.tān pāpān api niḥśaṅko yātrālagneṣu yojayet//
GS41yogay1_u:460: BY_11.11cd/.tān sarvān avalokyaiva prayāṇeṣv api yojayet//
GS41yogay1_u:461: BY_11.12ab/.horāgataḥ svabhavane yadi sūryaputro meṣopago 'vanisutaḥ svagṛhe śaśāṅkaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:462: BY_11.12cd/.śukras tulādharagato mithune budhaś ca siṃhe ravir yadi ca pārthivajanma vidyāt//
GS41yogay1_u:464: BY_11.13cd/.te sarve nānākhyā krūrāḥ saumyaiḥ samāścintyāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:465: BY_11.14ab/.yo yasya daśamagṛhagaḥ sa tasya vaśyas tu bhavati niyamena/
GS41yogay1_u:466: BY_11.14cd/.yaś cātha paṇapharasthaḥ sa bhavati rakṣopagas tadvat//
GS41yogay1_u:469: BY_11.16ab/.janmeśvaralagnapayor yaḥ śatrur lagnagaḥ sa saumyo 'pi/
GS41yogay1_u:470: BY_11.16cd/.kurute dehavipattiṃ krūro 'pi śubhaṃ tayor mitram//
GS41yogay1_u:471: BY_11.17ab/.bhaven na yaḥ kārakatānasaṃjñaḥ svajanmalagnādhipayoḥ śubho 'pi/
GS41yogay1_u:472: BY_11.17cd/.karoti lagnopagataḥ sa yātur bhayaṃ vināśaṃ ca bahuprakāram//
GS41yogay1_u:474: BY_11.18cd/.tasmāt praytnād idm eva cintyaṃ yiyāsatāṃ kārakatānayātam//
GS41yogay1_u:475: BY_11.19ab/.eko 'pi vakropagato narāṇāṃ śubho 'śubho vāpi catuṣṭayasthaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:495: BY_11.28a/.yo 'staṃ yāty udayaṃ vā dakṣiṇamārgasthitaḥ sahastrāṃśoḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:497: BY_11.29a/.tigmakarasyottarato darśanam āyāti yo graho 'staṃ vā/
GS41yogay1_u:498: BY_11.29b/.madhye tu vā sa lagne yātuḥ kusumāmbarāśanadaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:500: BY_11.30b/.vikṛtistho galnagato na śubhaḥ śubhadaḥ svabhavanasthaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:501: BY_11.31a/.yāmye tamo jñaḥ śravaṇe ravis tu jāto viśākhāsu sitaś ca puṣye/
GS41yogay1_u:506: BY_11.33b/.svayam arir upaiti vaśyaṃ praṇataśirāḥ sārvabhaumo 'pi//
GS41yogay1_u:507: BY_11.34a/.pakeśvarārilagne varge vā tasya bhūpatir gacchan/
GS41yogay1_u:511: BY_11.36a/.yātrāphalaṃ caturthe jāmitre śatravaḥ pramādaś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:513: BY_11.37a/.satyācāryasya mate vibalaḥ śastaḥ śaśī prayāṇeṣu/
GS41yogay1_u:514: BY_11.37b/.digvīryonaḥ kevalam induḥ śasta iti jagur anye//
GS41yogay1_u:515: BY_11.38a/.yad eva yasyodayasaṃsthitasya phalaṃ prayāṇe sadasat pradiṣṭam/
GS41yogay1_u:516: BY_11.38b/.tad eva tasyākhilam ahni yātur grahasya varge ca vilagnasaṃsthe//E38
GS41yogay1_u:518: BY_12.1ab/.vyasanaṃ prāpno(ti) mahad vyatipāte nirgato 'thavā mṛtyum/
GS41yogay1_u:526: BY_12.5ab/.na sadṛśadaśo 'bhiyojyaḥ sandhānaṃ tena bhūpater vyāsam/
GS41yogay1_u:534: BY_12.9ab/.upacayakartur vrajed diśaṃ balavati kaṇṭakage ca dikpatau/
GS41yogay1_u:535: BY_12.9cd/.manasāpi na digbalānvite digadhipatau ca lalāṭasaṃsthite//
GS41yogay1_u:537: BY_12.10cd/.krūrāv api nityam eva tau saumyair eva samāv udāhṛtau//
GS41yogay1_u:540: BY_12.12ab/.parasparaṃ saurikujau ravīndū trikoṇagau bhārgavalohitau ca/
GS41yogay1_u:541: BY_12.12cd/.phalaṃ yad uktaṃ tad aśeṣam eva vināśya paścāt svadiśaṃ nayantām//
GS41yogay1_u:542: BY_12.13ab/.ripudivaso yasya bhavet saumyo 'pi sa lagnago na śubhadātā/
GS41yogay1_u:547: BY_12.15cd/.bhānau kulīrajhaṣavṛścikage 'tidīrghā śastas tu devalamate 'dhvani pṛṣṭhato 'rkaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:555: BY_12.19cd/.śukre pravasan narer vaśaṃ yāti budhe ca vilomasaṃsthite//
GS41yogay1_u:556: BY_12.20ab/.anulo(ma)gate śaśāṅkaje śukre caivam api vyavasthite/
GS41yogay1_u:558: BY_12.21ab/.ākrandasārī dinamadhyago 'rkaḥ pauraḥ purastād aparatra yāyī/
GS41yogay1_u:559: BY_12.21cd/.ākranda indur gurumandasaumyāḥ paurāḥ smṛtā yāyina ity ato 'nye//
GS41yogay1_u:561: BY_12.22cd/.satyaṃ tathā kiṃ tu viśeṣam āhus te bhūpateḥ satphaladā jigīṣoḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:562: BY_12.23ab/.dṛṣṭe sāmnāṃ karmaniṣṭaṃ surārau vaitālīyaṃ pādadambhau ca hitvā/
GS41yogay1_u:563: BY_12.23cd/.śasto rāhus tryāyakarmopayāto yātavyaś cāsannatāgaś ca ketuḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:564: BY_12.24a/.sāmnāṃ śukrabṛhaspatī dinakaro vakraś ca daṇḍeśvarau
GS41yogay1_u:569: BY_12.25cd/.athāyanena yugapad ekasaṃsthayor dyunaktayo raviśaśinor vrajet tadā//E25
GS41yogay1_u:575: BY_13.3ab/.yoṣitsaukhyaṃ gaṇḍe dṛkcaramādhaś ca saṅgare vijayaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:576: BY_13.3cd/.śravaṇe ca hitaśravaṇaṃ nāsāyāṃ prītisaukhyaṃ ca//
GS41yogay1_u:579: BY_13.5ab/.haste 'rthāptiḥ pṛṣṭhe parājayo vakṣasi smṛto vijayaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:580: BY_13.5cd/.prītyutpattiḥ pārśve stane tv apūrvā viṣayalabdhiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:585: BY_13.8ab/.pṛṣṭhata ūrvor doṣaḥ purataś calane tu śacivahitalabdhiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:586: BY_13.8cd/.pracalati ca jānusandhāv arisandhānaṃ balavad uktam//
GS41yogay1_u:593: BY_14.1cd/.ripunidhanapraṇidhānaṃ prati bhavataḥ kiṃ manaḥ kurute//
GS41yogay1_u:594: BY_14.2ab/.brūyāt sa cen mama manaḥ protsahate harṣayet tataś caivam/
GS41yogay1_u:597: BY_14.3cd/.ekataś ca manaśśuddhis tad dhi śuddhaṃ jayāvaham//
GS41yogay1_u:598: BY_14.4ab/.kiyac ciraṃ na labhyeta nimittaṃ gamanānugam/
GS41yogay1_u:599: BY_14.4cd/.na tv eva tu mano 'narthaṃ cireṇāpy anumanyate//
GS41yogay1_u:601: BY_14.5cd/.tejo hy etac charīrasthaṃ trikālaphaladaṃ nṛṇām//
GS41yogay1_u:603: BY_14.6cd/.tasmāt sarvātmanā yātur anumeyaṃ sadā manaḥ//E6
GS41yogay1_u:606: BY_15.1cd/.tryaham atha vijayasnānaṃ gṛhayajñaṃ saptame divase//
GS41yogay1_u:611: BY_15.4ab/.ardhaniśāyām udayati saumye vakre 'thavā tadaṃśe vā/
GS41yogay1_u:612: BY_15.4cd/.dadyād baliṃ daśasv apy āśāsu purohitaḥ kramaśaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:621: BY_15.9ab/.evam uktvā tatas tv arghyaṃ pramathebhyaḥ pradāpayet/
GS41yogay1_u:625: BY_15.11ab/.ye syur bhūtagaṇās tebhyo namo 'stv ity anuyāntu ca/
GS41yogay1_u:629: BY_15.13ab/.nivṛttayātraḥ punar apy ahaṃ hi vo vijitya śatrūn bhavatāṃ prasādataḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:630: BY_15.13cd/.ato viśiṣṭaṃ bahuvittam uttamaṃ baliṃ kariṣye vidhinopapāditam//
GS41yogay1_u:631: BY_15.14ab/.anarcitā ye nṛpatiṃ savāhanaṃ vināśayanti kṣapayanti vā camūn/
GS41yogay1_u:632: BY_15.14cd/.supūjitāḥ siddhikarā bhavanti te pravādhakāḥ śatrugaṇasya cāhave//
GS41yogay1_u:638: BY_16.2ab/.abhyarcya mantrais tu purohitas tān adhaś ca tasyāṃ bhuvi saṃskṛtāyām/
GS41yogay1_u:639: BY_16.2cd/.darbhais tu kṛtvāstaram akṣatais ca kiret samantāt sitasarṣapaiś ca//
GS41yogay1_u:640: BY_16.3ab/.brāhmīṃ sadūrvām atha nāgapuṣpīṃ kṛtvopadhānaṃ śirasi kṣitīśaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:641: BY_16.3cd/.pūrṇān ghaṭān puṣpaphalābhidhānān āśāsu kuryāc caturaḥ krameṇa//
GS41yogay1_u:642: BY_16.4ab/.yaj jāgrato dūram upaiti daivam āvartya mantrāṃ kramaśas trir etam/
GS41yogay1_u:643: BY_16.4cd/.laghv ekabhug dakṣiṇapārśvaśāyī svapnaṃ parīkṣeta yathopadeśam//
GS41yogay1_u:649: BY_16.7cd/.niśānte paśyati svapnaṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vā 'śubham//
GS41yogay1_u:656: BY_16.11ab/.daśāsu coktaṃ grahapākajātaṃ cintā tu dṛṣā tu yathā tathaiva/
GS41yogay1_u:659: BY_16.12cd/.dyudṛṣṭapūrvāḥ kathitāś ca tadvad anyatra loke kathitā viśeṣāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:666: BY_16.14c/.bandho vā nigale grasec ca dahanaṃ nānāśirobāhutā
GS41yogay1_u:667: BY_16.14d/.chatraṃ vā dvirado 'bhiṣicya bibhṛyād divyo 'thavā brāhmaṇaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:671: BY_16.15d/.viśati yadi vā suśliṣṭāṅgī tanuṃ pravarāṅganā//
GS41yogay1_u:677: BY_16.17b/.daraṇam api ca mūrdhnaḥ sapta pañca tridhā vā/

GS41yogay1_u:735: BY_17.6ab/.tasya grahānulomaṃ kālaṃ kecij jagur niṣeveta/
GS41yogay1_u:741: BY_17.9ab/.śvetasya babhror athavā vṛṣasya carmāstare vyāghramṛgendrayor vā/
GS41yogay1_u:742: BY_17.9cd/.tatsthasya kuryān manujeśvarasya jayābhiṣekaṃ vidhivat purodhāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:743: BY_17.10ab/.kramān mahīrūpyasuvarṇakumbhaiḥ kṣīrasya dadhno haviṣaś ca pūrṇaiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:744: BY_17.10cd/.snāyāc ca toyaiḥ saha saptamṛdbhiḥ paścāc ca sarvauṣadhigandhatoyaiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:747: BY_17.12ab/.dvātriṃśatiṃ ṣoḍaśa vāthavāṣṭau ghaṭapramāṇaṃ munibhiḥ pradiṣṭam/
GS41yogay1_u:748: BY_17.12cd/.snātas tv alaṅkāram apāsya pūrvaṃ navaṃ vidadhyād dvijamantrapūrtam//
GS41yogay1_u:752: BY_17.14cd/.vāme 'sya pārśve 'grata āsthito vā pratīpapātaṃ juhuyād dhutāśam//
GS41yogay1_u:754: BY_17.15cd/.āsevya sarvāṇi yathopadeśaṃ bhaktyā dvijān svasti ca vācayitvā//
GS41yogay1_u:755: BY_17.16ab/.saumyena yāyāt phalapuṣpapāṇir dvāreṇa paśyen na ca pauruhūtam/
GS41yogay1_u:756: BY_17.16cd/.prāg uddhared dakṣiṇapādam evaṃ kurvan nṛpaḥ sarvaripūn praśāsti//E16
GS41yogay1_u:758: BY_18.1ab/.grahayajñam ato vakṣye tatra nimittāni lakṣayed vedyām/[cited in bs 43.14]
GS41yogay1_u:763: BY_18.3cd/.ā kṛṣṇeti ca mantro raktā gandhāḥ sahāguraṇāḥ//

GS41yogay1_u:790: BY_18.17ab/.annāt parisrutādyo mantraḥ strīkarkaśās tv alaṅkārāḥ/

GS41yogay1_u:815: BY_19.5ab/.bhūyo bhūyas tathā jvālāṃ saṃspṛśyātha purohitaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:816: BY_19.5cd/.spṛśec ca nṛpatiṃ mantrair uccair brūyāt punaḥ punaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:817: BY_19.6ab/.cakṣurdaḥ prāṇadaś cāpi varcodaś ca bhava prabho/
GS41yogay1_u:819: BY_19.7ab/.śātravāṇāṃ tathā rājāpy anādhṛṣyo bhavaty ayam/
GS41yogay1_u:820: BY_19.7cd/.hūyamāne nimittāni vakṣyāmy aham ataḥ param//
GS41yogay1_u:822: BY_19.8b/.dgārādyaṃ ca purodhasaḥ smṛtivipac cāniṣṭam anyac chubham/
GS41yogay1_u:824: BY_19.8d/.tan neṣṭaṃ śubham anyathopakaraṇaṃ dravyāṇy anūnāni ca//
GS41yogay1_u:825: BY_19.9a/.utthāya svayam ujjvalārcir analaḥ svāhāvasāne havir

GS41yogay1_u:832: BY_19.10d/.savye 'ṅge nṛpatiṃ dahann atihitaḥ śeṣaṃ ca lokād vadet//E10

GS41yogay1_u:917: BY_23.1ab/.anyajanmāntarakṛtaṃ puṃsāṃ karma\footnote{Bṣ 85.5b karma puṃsāṃ} śubhāśubham/

GS41yogay1_u:1017: BY_23.51ab/.pūrvaṃ prāveśiko bhūtvā punaḥ prāsthāniko bhavet/

GS41yogay1_u:1080: BY_25.1ab/.śasto nīḍas tu vaiśākhe padape nirupadrave/

GS41yogay1_u:1088: BY_25.5ab/.raktadravyaṃ pradagdhaṃ vā nyasan gehe 'gnidaḥ smṛtaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:1093: BY_25.7cd/.vargataś cābhighātaḥ syād ripuvṛddhiś ca nirbhayaiḥ//

GS41yogay1_u:1105: BY_25.13cd/.pratyurasy upasarpan ca saṃsparśan ca tathā bhavet//
GS41yogay1_u:1109: BY_25.15cd/.vāyasaḥ śasyate yātus tūṣṇībhūto ruvann api//
GS41yogay1_u:1114: BY_26.1cd/.sabhayo vicaran vinā nimittaṃ na śubhaś cābhimukho bhaṣan likhan gām//
GS41yogay1_u:1115: BY_26.2ab/.uccair bhaṣaṇaṃ samāgatānāṃ dīnaṃ vābhirutaṃ raviṃ nirīkṣya/

GS41yogay1_u:1117: BY_26.3ab/.pūrṇāsyatvaṃ ghrāyakatvaṃ ca yātuḥ prādakṣiṇyaṃ maithunaṃ cānulomam/

GS41yogay1_u:1127: BY_27.4cd/.sa jayati sakalāṃ tato dharitrīṃ grahaṇadṛgālabhanaśrutair upāsya//
GS41yogay1_u:1136: BY_28.1cd/.uttiṣṭhato vāmbaram eti saṅgaṃ patec ca vā tannṛpateḥ kṣayāya/
GS41yogay1_u:1138: BY_28.2cd/.prāyo bale netari vā nṛpe vā jānīta rājño bhayakāraṇaṃ tat//
GS41yogay1_u:1140: BY_28.3cd/.neṣṭāni śabdāś ca tathaiva yātur āgacchatiṣṭhapraviśasthirādyāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:1141: BY_28.4ab/.kāryam tu mūlaśakune 'nyataraje tadahni vidyāt phalaṃ niyatam evam ime vicintyāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:1142: BY_28.4cd/.prārambhayānasamaye tu tathā praveśe grāhyaṃ kṣutam na śubhadaṃ kvacid apy uśanti//
GS41yogay1_u:1143: BY_28.5a/.krośād ūrdhvaṃ śakunavirutaṃ niṣphalaṃ prāhur eke
GS41yogay1_u:1144: BY_28.5b/.tatrāniṣṭe prathamaśukune mānayet paṃca ṣaḍ vā/
GS41yogay1_u:1146: BY_28.5d/.pratyāgacchet svabhavanam ato yady aniṣṭas tṛtīyaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:1147: BY_28.6ab/.cakre varāhamihiraḥ śakunopadeśam uddeśato munimatāny avalokya samyak/
GS41yogay1_u:1148: BY_28.6cd/.yad granthavistarabhayād avijānato vā noktaṃ tad anyakathitād api cintanīyam//E6
GS41yogay1_u:1150: BY_29.1ab/.snigdhā sthirā surabhigulmalatā sugandhā śastā pradakṣiṇajalā ca nivāsabhūmiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:1153: BY_29.2cd/.hatvā paśuṃ ripugṛhākṛtam udyame ca prāsyātha vānnamayam asya vidhāya rūpam//
GS41yogay1_u:1156: BY_29.4ab/.tac cāyuktam iti prāhur horāśāstravido janāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:1161: BY_30.2ab/.visrambhahā krodhavaśo nṛśaṃsaḥ kṣudraḥ pramādī na bahuśrutaś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:1162: BY_30.2cd/.divyāntarikṣakṣitijair vikārair nipīḍito yaḥ sa tu daivahīnaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:1164: BY_30.3cd/.tarur ghunair jagdha ivāttavīryo mahān api kṣipram upaiti bhaṅgam//E3
GS41yogay1_u:1167: BY_31.1cd/.sotpātaprakṛtiviparyayānuyātā śokārtā ripuvaśam āśu yāti senā//
GS41yogay1_u:1168: BY_31.2ab/.saṃgrāme vayam amaradvijaprasādāj jyoṣyāmo ripubalam āśv asaṃśayena/
GS41yogay1_u:1169: BY_31.2cd/.yasyaivaṃ bhavati bale janapravādaḥ so 'lpo 'pi pracurabalaṃ ripuṃ nihanti//
GS41yogay1_u:1175: BY_31.4cd/.jayadam ubhayapārśvādhiṣṭhitaṃ pṛṣṭhato vā na śubhakaram ato 'nyad yānakāle nṛbhartuḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:1177: BY_31.5cd/.vajramucaḥ kṣatajāśmamuco vā balabhayam āśu janāḥ kathayanti//
GS41yogay1_u:1178: BY_31.6ab/.bhṛśaṃ kṣaranto rudhirāruṇā vā saśakracāpā khararūkṣanādāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:1183: BY_31.7d/.kṣc coṣṇāyāṃ bhavati na cirād ambudāyāṃ vināśaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:1186: BY_31.9ab/.cāpam aindram anulomam akhaṇḍaṃ projjvalaṃ bahulam āyatam iṣṭam/
GS41yogay1_u:1188: BY_31.10ab/.tanvī pralambā vijayāya dīrghā taḍid ghanasphūrjathuvarjitā ca/
GS41yogay1_u:1190: BY_31.11ab/.lagne 'rkendū nighnatī śasti paurān ulkā hanyād yātupaurān grahāś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:1191: BY_31.11cd/.yātuḥ śastā sambhṛtā vā dhruvarkṣe neṣṭāto 'nyā dhūminī śyāvaraktā//
GS41yogay1_u:1193: BY_31.12cd/.velā kramaśo dināditaḥ kāṣṭhāyāṃ ca sa yatra bhūsvanaś ca//
GS41yogay1_u:1194: BY_31.13ab/.śastā śāntadvijamṛgaghuṣṭā sandhyā snigdhā mṛduṣavanā ca/
GS41yogay1_u:1195: BY_31.13cd/.pāṃśudhvastā janapadanāśaṃ dhatte rūkṣā rudhiranibhā vā//E13
GS41yogay1_u:1200: BY_32.2cd/.nīhāraḥ pāṃśupātaś ca hitaḥ snigdhaḥ pradakṣiṇaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:1202: BY_32.3cd/.baleśaṃ yuvarājaṃ ca purohitam iti kramāt//
GS41yogay1_u:1204: BY_32.4cd/.pradakṣiṇaṃ tu yātrāyāṃ jayadaṃ neṣṭam anyathā//
GS41yogay1_u:1206: BY_32.5cd/.śvabhronnate vadho rājño jayāya vyatyayena ca//
GS41yogay1_u:1207: BY_32.6ab/.ghṛtāmbupayasāṃ srāve cyute vṛkṣāc ca tatkṣayaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:1208: BY_32.6cd/.taile ca nāśo mukhyānāṃ rakte śastrakṛtaṃ bhayam//
GS41yogay1_u:1209: BY_32.7ab/.madyena tu mitho bhedo rugbhayaṃ dadhinisrave/
GS41yogay1_u:1214: BY_32.9cd/.dinolkāyāṃ ca pīḍyante janā bhūpatibhiḥ saha//
GS41yogay1_u:1215: BY_32.10ab/.saptāhaṃ santatāny ato vṛṣṭir hanyān narādhipam/
GS41yogay1_u:1216: BY_32.10cd/.anagnijvalane puṃsāṃ vyādhir āśv eva jāyate//
GS41yogay1_u:1222: BY_32.13cd/.gadane cāpi deśasya nāśaṃ māsatrayād vadet//
GS41yogay1_u:1229: BY_32.17ab/.niśi suracāpaṃ sitavarṇādyaṃ janayati pīḍāṃ dvijapūrvāṇām/
GS41yogay1_u:1230: BY_32.17cd/.bhavati ca yasyāṃ diśi taddiśyaṃ narapatimukhyaṃ na cirād dhanyāt//
GS41yogay1_u:1232: BY_32.18cd/.vibudhapatidhvajatoraṇapātaḥ phalam idam eva karoti nṛpāṇām//E18
GS41yogay1_u:1236: BY_33.1c/.sarvārambhaphalaprasiddhir udaye rāśau ca kartuḥ śubhe
GS41yogay1_u:1238: BY_33.2ab/.krūrodaye tadahani vyatipātayoge rikte tithāv ṛtusamāptiṣu vaidhṛte vā/
GS41yogay1_u:1239: BY_33.2cd/.tīkṣṇograbheṣu ca hutāśaviṣābhighātaraudrāṇi siddhim upayāny asite ca pakṣe//
GS41yogay1_u:1241: BY_33.3cd/.sūryendvoḥ pariveṣakhaṇḍam athavā dṛśyeta yasyāṃ diśi/
GS41yogay1_u:1243: BY_33.4cd/.sainye vāpi yato viśanti hi tataḥ śastroḥ puraṃ ghātayet//
GS41yogay1_u:1244: BY_33.5ab/.pātālarkṣe rāhuketvoḥ pure 'res toyocchittiḥ sālapātaś ca kāryaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:1245: BY_33.5cd/.jāmitrasthe bhūmije 'syāṃśake vā putreṇendor vīkṣite 'gniḥ pradeyaḥ//E5
GS41yogay1_u:1248: BY_34.1cd/.yuddhānte mṛgaśakunaiś ca dīptanādair no bhadraṃ bhavati jaye 'pi pārthivasya//
GS41yogay1_u:1251: BY_34.3a/.yadānyad api vaikṛtaṃ na vijayāvasāne bhavet
GS41yogay1_u:1252: BY_34.3b/.tadā sukham akaṇṭakaṃ nṛpatir atti deśaṃ ripoḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:1253: BY_34.3c/.udvāham akālotsavam abhiṣekaṃ cātmajasya yaḥ kṛtvā/
GS41yogay1_u:1261: BY_34.6ab/.iti manujapatir yathopadeśaṃ bhagaṇavidāṃ prakaroti yo vacāṃsi/
